paragraph.text: Sengoku High is a school that lives on the blockchain with 7,777 fighters ready to be enrolled. Each fighter is original, come with its own style and weapons.

It is the year 2050, through the miracles of science, humanity has gained incredible powers. Increased strength, speed and manipulation of the elements are now possible. Schools specializing in teaching the new generation of humans on how to use this new found power have started popping up all over the world.

Hayato is a 17 year old boy who is gifted with an exceptional talent to fully utilized his gifts. He has aspirations to compete in the National (Fight?) Tournament and be the champion. Fortunately for him, a scout named Megumi from Sengoku High, a top (Fight?) school, has recognized his potential.

Not wanting to miss the oppotunity to improve his skills and gain recognition, Hayoto enrolled into Sengoku High. Unbeknownst to Hayato, Megumi has an ulterior motive for scouting him in the first place.

features.title: Hayato
features.subtitle: 隼人
features.text: A reckless shonen that possesses special power

features.title: Kenji
features.subtitle: 賢司
features.text: Dean of Swords in Sengoku High

features.title: Akira
features.subtitle: アキラ
features.text: Dean of Stealth in Sengoku High

features.title: Ogawa
features.subtitle: 小川
features.text: Dean of Sorcery in Sengoku High

features.title: Makiyo
features.subtitle: マキヨ
features.text: Dean of Summoning in Sengoku High

Styles.title: Disciplines
Styles.subtitle: 戦闘スタイル
Styles.description1: There four disciplines in Sengoku High, each with their strengths and weaknesses.

features.title: Swords
features.subtitle: 刀
features.text: The Swords discipline specializes in close quaters combat, whether with melee weapons or barefisted. Students are expected to endure grueling training to build up their minds and body.

features.title: Stealth
features.subtitle: 暗殺
features.text: The Stealth discipline specializes in multiple skill sets in the areas of stealth. Sneaking, espionage and using concealed weapons are all taught to students.

features.title: Sorcery
features.subtitle: 魔法
features.text: The Sorcery discipline specializes in the study of the elements that make up the world. Students are encouraged to share their research with fellow peers to further expand upon each other's knowledge of elemental manipulation.  (Many school fires are started because of students playing with fire.)

features.title: Summoning
features.subtitle: 召喚
features.text: The Summoning discipline specializes in communicating with spirits previously invisible to humans. Students are able to befriend spirits and give form to them. Be warned, not all spirits are friendly!

texts.title: And More
texts.text: Every characters are equipped with a combination of gears that has rarity ranging from common to mythic
Character's total power level scales with combined items' rarity
Character's rarity will contribute to our game mechanics; PvP, future contests and raffles
Stay tune for more detail TBA!

Roadmap.title: Roadmap
Roadmap.description1: Each milestone is unlocked after a certain percentage of Student NFT have been minted. Any suggestions for new concept are welcomed.

Team.title: Team
Team.description2: We are developing a project that revolves around anime style content and our objective is to create a NFT that is not just a regular token, but something that has utility in our project ecosystem that we are creating.

paragraph.text: Sengoku High is a school that lives on the blockchain with 7,777 fighters ready to be enrolled. Each fighter is original, come with its own style and weapons.
